select cno from comments where isSelected = 1 and bno =#{bno} ;
select board.*, ifnull(c.cnt, 0) as cnt from board left join ( select bno, count(*) as cnt from comments group by bno) as c on board.bno = c.bno where bstate =#{bstate} order by bno desc
select board.*, ifnull(c.cnt, 0) as cnt from board left join ( select bno, count(*) as cnt from comments group by bno) as c on board.bno = c.bno where bwriter =#{bwriter} order by bno desc
